description: Number of monomer-dimer tilings of n X n chessboard.
comments: Also the total number of matchings (not necessarily perfect ones; i.e., Hosoya index) in the n X n grid. - Andre Poenitz (poenitz(AT)htwm.de), Nov 20 2003
references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 406-412.
links: Jennifer Henry, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..21 [From S. R. Finch, Jan 30 2009]
Ahrens, J. H. Paving the chessboard. J. Combin. Theory Ser. A 31(1981), no. 3, 277--288. MR0635371 (84d:05009). See Table I. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 27 2012
S. R. Finch, Two Dimensional Monomer-Dimer Constant
P. Flajolet and R. Sedgewick, Analytic Combinatorics, 2009; see page 362
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Grid Graph
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Hosoya Index

crossrefs: Cf. A004003. A diagonal of A210662.
